name: Trudy and Hawking vs the SpiderQueen
name_original: Trudy and Hawking vs the SpiderQueen
description:
WARNING: might not be suitable for photosensitive Epilepsy.  Mild gore.

Download the game for a far superior Sound experience. 

Please Play in full screen mode

Game made for the Wowie jam August 12th 2022 by me(Sigurd Vatnehol.) and a Friend.(Marius Gundersen).

The theme of the game jam was AI Collaboration, and we used the theme in a handful of ways. The story of the game was generated using InferKit.com, as well as the player having a AI companion that help them. 

Trudy and Hawking vs the spider queen is a boss fight designed from the story made by the AI. It's a short but intense bullet-hell boss fight packed with atmosphere. 

All assets, code, music and sounds were made by us during the jam, and the Stephen Hawking voice was made with a text to speech generator.
